thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TransferWise | transferwise.com | 15 of 1794
thread.title: Chesnee

author: Chesnee
title: Chesnee
text: I was very nervous using this service. I moved to Milan from Brisbane Australia and needed to transfer my AUD over to EUR. My bank uses a sms verification code system to my old Australian number which does not work in Italy which means I wasn't able to simply make an international transfer or any local transfer to my friends and family either for that matter. TransferWise allowed me get all my Euros over and I also saved the two transfer fees I would've been paid if I had done a normal internal money transfer. Very happy. - Thanks guys!
